effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used fire pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon will take 1/8 their max HP in damage at the end of every turn for four turns (including this one).
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used fire pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon will take 1/8 their max HP in damage at the end of every turn for four turns (including this one).
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used fire pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon will take 1/8 their max HP in damage at the end of every turn for four turns (including this one).

short_effect.sun_moon: With Fire Pledge, damages opposing Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every turn for four turns.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: With Fire Pledge, damages opposing Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every turn for four turns.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: With Fire Pledge, damages opposing Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every turn for four turns.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast swamp appears.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast swamp appears.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast swamp appears.
